name: WeatherShipIdle
description:
Small idle game,  in which you have to find the perfect real-time weather conditions on earth based on real weather data.

made for lame jam 26: https://itch.io/jam/lame-jam-26

============

  1. Sound effects by Kenney.nl https://opengameart.org/content/51-ui-sound-effects-buttons-switches-and-clicks
  2. Music from https://opengameart.org/content/tragic-ambient-main-menu
  3. Weather data from https://open-meteo.com/
  4. Font from https://www.dafont.com/dogica.font
